rows.label: qst700108_msg0001
rows.name: Ah, everyone!

rows.label: qst700108_msg0002
rows.name:
Thank you so much. Thanks to
you, all the Armu are back...

rows.label: qst700108_msg0003
rows.name: Uuuh, sniff...

rows.label: qst700108_msg0004
rows.name: Oh, come on, don't cry.

rows.label: qst700108_msg0005
rows.name: I-I'm not crying, you idiot.

rows.label: qst700108_msg0006
rows.name:
You know, you're just too nosy.
Stop meddling in my business.

rows.label: qst700108_msg0007
rows.name: ...What? Is it wrong for me to worry?

rows.label: qst700108_msg0008
rows.name:
It's not wrong, it's just...
I don't know how to react...

rows.label: qst700108_msg0009
rows.name: ...Aargh, forget what I just said!

rows.label: qst700108_msg0010
rows.name: Anyway, thanks for finding our Armu!

rows.label: qst700108_msg0011
rows.name:
Time to celebrate with
a fish feast, right?

rows.label: qst700108_msg0012
rows.name: Yeah! ...But there's none for you!

rows.label: qst700108_msg0013
rows.name:
Ugh, who'd even ask for
any! Idiot! Idiot, idiot!

rows.label: qst700108_msg0014
rows.name: Wh-What did I say?!

rows.label: qst700108_msg0015
rows.name:
This looks like it might stir up
another storm... don't you think?

rows.label: qst700108_msg0016
rows.name: What are your thoughts, Hugo?

rows.label: qst700108_msg0017
rows.name: Eh? Right...

rows.label: qst700108_msg0018
rows.name: Honestly, it doesn't matter to me.

rows.label: qst700108_msg0019
rows.name:
As long as days like this continue...
where they can worry, and laugh,
and just be themselves...

rows.label: qst700108_msg0020
rows.name:
...No. We have to *make
sure* they continue.

rows.label: qst700108_msg0021
rows.name: Your Majesty...

rows.label: qst700108_msg0022
rows.name:
I understand how you feel, but
dwelling on it will do you no good.

rows.label: qst700108_msg0023
rows.name:
He's right. You should try
emptying your head for a
bit, like Adel here.

rows.label: qst700108_msg0024
rows.name: Hahaha, you wound me.

rows.label: qst700108_msg0025
rows.name:
But... we have this many people gathered
here. I think you can afford to lean on
us a little, Hugo. It won't hurt.

rows.label: qst700108_msg0026
rows.name:
...You really don't
change, do you, Adel?

rows.label: qst700108_msg0027
rows.name: Neither do you.

rows.label: qst700108_msg0028
rows.name:
Well, at least you seem
to have calmed down.

rows.label: qst700108_msg0029
rows.name:
No one can carry everything
on their own. Just don't
forget that, all right?
